instruction: Compose a song about staying positive in difficult times.
output:
Verse 1:

When the darkness shows its face
And all you see is fear
Take a deep breath and trust
That brighter days will appear

Chorus:

Keep your head high and know that you're strong
Look for courage and find you belong
Just take it one day at a time
And you'll stay positive in tough times

Verse 2:

Don't lose sight of the fight
That's inside of you
It takes courage and strength
To stay focused and break through

Chorus:

Keep your head high and know that you're strong
Look for courage and find you belong
Just take it one day at a time
And you'll stay positive in tough times

Bridge:

When times are tough, don't give up and run
Cause you're strong and you can't be outdone
Hold onto hope, put all your faith in it
Facing the darkness, don't succumb to it

Chorus:

Keep your head high and know that you're strong
Look for courage and find you belong
Just take it one day at a time
And you'll stay positive in tough times
